title: PUCSL announce power cuts for weekend
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) yesterday said a two-hour power cut will be enforced on Saturday and a one-hour power cut on Sunday.

As per the weekend power cut schedule, on Saturday, areas A to L will experience a two-hour power disruption between 3 p.m. and 9 p.m., while areas P to W will face a two-hour power disruption between 3 p.m. and 10 p.m.
Area of CC1 will experience a three hour and 30-minute disruption from 6 p.m. to 9 p.m.
On Sunday, areas A to L and P to W will experience a one-hour power cut from 6 p.m. to 10 p.m.
Area CC1 will face a three hour and 30-minute power cut from 6 p.m. to 9:30 a.m.
